text: My go-to framer Farook. Quality frames at very reasonable prices. After sales service is top notch as well. Went back to him to clean up a framed jersey which somehow got dirty. He initially refused payment but I had to pay him. For his expertise, time and effort to help me. Thank you Farook!

Very friendly, explained everything in detail, thorough consultation on the frames and materials. Reasonable price for the excellent quality. Fast turnaround. Turned out better than I expected. Thank you for the great service, highly recommend!
Uncle Kareem has been a family friend for 2 generations. Wide range of frames for different budgets and different occasions. Fast delivery and very good workmanship with quality
Did framing services for 2 artworks and engaged Kareem for wall hanging services. Was well done and the owner was very nice and accommodating. Recommended!

First time coming here. Very nice boss.
He gave good recommendations.  Frame turn out fantastic.  Good job.
Came in on Saturday. He finished it on Monday. Very fast indeed. He is very experienced. Price is reasonable. Place is easy to find using Google maps.
Highly recommended.
Thank you boss üòéüëç
Regards Johan
